website_summaries.verdict: With 2 configuration options, thrilling dips and turns, and enough room for 2 kids to play, this roadway delivers great value for the money.
pros: Converts from horizontal to upright, offering variety that kids won't quickly tire of
Allows for both seated and standing play
Steep ramps and loads of spirals deliver a visually thrilling ride
Lower-level gas pump encourages imaginative play
Comes with 2 custom wheelies, but the track accommodates most matchbox cars
cons: Easy enough to assemble, but requires a screwdriver

customer_reviews.title: Enjoyable for kids for quite a while
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my nephew when he was 2. He's nearly 4 now and still plays with it. There are all sorts of little shapes and details that the kids seem to notice at different stages of development. One time when he came over, he named all the dogs, cats, and monkeys. Another time, while we were playing cars, he would tell me "watch out" whenever I got near the banana peel. It's still his favorite toy when he comes to our house. As soon as he comes, he points to the room where we keep it and asks me to bring it out. Orange Car and Purple Car have become steadfast companions on our journey into his imagination.
customer_reviews.author: C.G.

customer_reviews.title: My 21 month old LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month old son LOVES this! It took me about 20min to assemble, but it was totally worth it. He loves cars to begin with, but I've never seen him have so much fun with any toy. He's almost shouting with excitement pushing the cars around the track and releasing them down the ramp. He's been playing with it for 2 full hours (and he's not one to stick with a toy for very long). Best $24 I ever spent on a toy!
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: A toddler's dream
customer_reviews.text: We gave this toy as a birthday gift to a two-year-old. He's pretty advanced in his language ability and his coordination and small motor skills, so not only was it perfect for him, but he was able to express his delight. "Car go fast, ha!" and "Want to play with the car thing." He's had it about three weeks now, and his mother reports that it gets daily use. The fact that it can be set up in more than one way adds some interest, but he prefers the tall set up so the car can go faster. It's a lot of fun to give a gift that is such a success!
customer_reviews.author: TLD in Oregon

customer_reviews.title: A Transforming Track Set Up!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun transformable track set up for the cars that come with it. Assembly was doable but there were about 40 steps so it took some time. It entertains my three year old grandson for 5-10 minute breaks from his wooden train set so it is a great secondary play option—not the mainstay. The changeability from the tall set up to the flatter one is very cool! Order two extra cars!
customer_reviews.author: JB Fruittee

customer_reviews.title: Very cool!
customer_reviews.text: Had this toy for a year now. Durable design and very cool engineering went into this. My girls, now 5 and almost 3, love this "Umi-city" and play with it with all types of cars and little figures. Lots of pretent play happens here. The only reason I did not give this 5 stars is because of a metal peg that slowly migrates out when the top portion is lifted and lowered a lot. It only had to be pushed back in about 2-3 times this past year, so it isn't a huge deal. All toys need to be checked and maintained regularly anyway.
customer_reviews.author: R H

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old got this for Christmas. It was a hit. He LOVES it. So does his two big sisters and parents and grandparents. Everyone is having a blast with this. It comes with 2 cars, but I bought him 4 more. He lines them all up and lets them go at the same time. He likes it standing or sitting. He cannot change the position himself, so every once in a while he will point to it and whine if he wants it changed. When it's in the standing position it's tall, but the foot print isn't very big, so it doesn't really take up too much room. Definitely a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: MamaBear

customer_reviews.title: Two toys for the price of one!!
customer_reviews.text: This is great value for the money, it's basically two toys in one. Our son is a 1.5 years old and we got this for him since he loves cars. It was an instant hit, even our 15 year old loves It! Lol It is super easy to turn from the tall to the sit down track, just push the buttons and fold. Most hot wheels we have tried work, they go down a little rough but I think this makes it more exciting actually. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal and a Huge Hit with My 2 Yr Old!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his second birthday and he LOVES it! I love that it has 2 positions for playing or storage. Fun for my older daughter as well. Only thing is that it does require a bit of time and effort to assemble. You need to actually screw the pieces together with a screw driver. It would have been nice if it snapped together somehow, but this is a minor issue for us.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun for challenging to put together
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this toy, but it is a bit challenging to put together. There are lots of screws and it is not always clear from the instructions where they go. We only use it in the upright orientation because we don't know how to convert and sometimes that various levels are not in sync and the cars get caught. Probably from lack of correct screws. But the cars come zooming down the ramp when it is set up and our 1/.5 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Instant hit as a 2-in-1 track
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while for this to come back in stock, but it was a huge hit with my almost 2 year old. I really like that it can basically become two different toys as young kids get so bored with things so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: deipnosophist

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2-year-old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my baby for his 2nd birthday. What a great purchase. He loves this toy and spends hours playing with it. It took me a good half an hour to assemble it but I did it alone and am by no means handy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: t_crafty

customer_reviews.title: Super cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a fun ramp toy! My 2-year-old and my 8-month-old love watching the cars swoop and curve until they zoom out the bottom. It was pretty easy to put together and is very sturdy (though not heavy). I like all the little elements for imaginary play (gas nozzle, car wash door, ice cream stand, etc). It's very simple to transform back and forth. The cars that come with it are actually very nice, and I like that there's a handy "parking lot" storage place built in for them. Altogether, definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vance Pate

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for 1-5 year olds (sorting time plus fast cars)
customer_reviews.text: This was a pain to construct. Not quiet clear on the instructions... if not correctly constructed unit will not fold. Folding in itself is difficult for small children. Buttons are needed to be pushed to release the tower to a horizontal unit. However, nine of my 11 grandchildren were in fact thrilled with the toy They tested which cars or toys fit into the slide and made to the bottom. Ages 1-5. I bought get three.
customer_reviews.author: lynne72

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: Paid extra for this particular item because it's an older model that came out a few years ago, but I liked that it collapses from a tower to floor play, which it makes it more versatile. It's really cute. My son likes it, he's 1.5 years old. It's about as tall as him when in tower mode. Comes with 2 cars, a girl car and a boy car. I bought more to go with it.. the superhero set of wheelies also through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The construction is pretty good. It is not as sturdy as I ...
customer_reviews.text: My 2-year-old is a car obsessive. We have had this for over 3 months now. He stills plays with this daily. The construction is pretty good. It is not as sturdy as I would have liked, but it wasn't an $100 toy either. So far it has held up very well to pretty abusive use. I really like that there are 2 ways to play. It was a great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Poledra

customer_reviews.title: Good price for an awesome toy.
customer_reviews.text: My family has always loved anything Little People/Fisher Price. Just like all of their toys this is very sturdy and well made. I look forward to passing this along for many years. A lot of assembly required but instruction book was very easy to follow. Probably would have taken me only about 10 minutes without my 13 month old “helping” me. He loves it! Only comes with two cars so I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: This toy has a large number of pieces to assemble. Part of the direction are hard to figure out. Some of the pieces are hard to put together and one part wont stay together, I am going to use glue and screw. The directions were too difficult to understand to raise and lower it so I am leaving it upright. My 2 yr old likes it, but I think it was a poor investment.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra McLean

customer_reviews.title: Nice that you can convert from one layout to another
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr old loves it. Has spent many hours playing with it. Nice that you can convert from one layout to another. Does require a fair bit of assembly. Not hard, and the instructions are well done, but takes 30 mins or so to assemble. No other size car (like matchbox) works well with this. You are pretty much restricted to the included cars.
customer_reviews.author: Ayla

customer_reviews.title: Overall like. But between this and the original version
customer_reviews.text: Overall like. But between this and the original version, I would choose the one that doesn't fold down. It takes up more space and only one ramp. The original had 3 that spiraled down and it was fun to guess where it would come out. All on the same side so it wasn't confusing for littles, but a fun surprise .
customer_reviews.author: DeJarnatt21

customer_reviews.title: The toy itself is great and my nephew who I purchased it for loves ...
customer_reviews.text: When i purchased this item, I thought I received an opened box; however, the extra tape on the box is how it is sold. I saw it in store and realized it wasn't previously used or Amazon adding extra enforcement. The toy itself is great and my nephew who I purchased it for loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Saffie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for my 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy in both forms. She isn't exactly gentle with it and it's held up great. I love how it changes because it keeps her from getting bored with it. I'd buy this again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Lally810

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is a great toy, but the package I received was like it got caught in a tornado. Pieces discolored and instructions all mushed up underneath all the pieces. The box is somewhat beat up to and barely being held together with barely sticky tape!
customer_reviews.author: Allycat

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was more Little People integration so if you place a person on a spot it would make music or do something fun to incorporate with his other Little People toys
customer_reviews.text: My 16mo. little guy LOVES this toy! He uses it daily and likes to put balls down the track too. Please note, the Little People don't fit in the cars but they have specific Little People cars (with unmovable people) that come with it and more can be purchased. Wish there was more Little People integration so if you place a person on a spot it would make music or do something fun to incorporate with his other Little People toys.
customer_reviews.author: CBLAIR83

customer_reviews.title: The best toy we've ever bought our son
customer_reviews.text: *Update: have had this toy for 2 years now, it still gets a lot of use and is still perfect condition. Great quality.* The best toy we've ever bought our son. It transitions from standing to sitting position very easily. The fisher price cars that come with it are great- you can even purchase extra cars. It will work with other types of cars as well.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Hollan

customer_reviews.title: It would be better if there are no "arrow holes"
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it and plays with it everyday. I would give it 5 stars if they make the "arrow holes" smaller or even remove it so that hotwheels or matchbox cars would run smoothly like their fisher price cars. I understand they would want you to buy their own cars but kids don't understand that if they used smaller ones, it tend to stop, gets stuck and it's not good if you're child is having a bad mood at the moment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present. Thankfully we had read the reviews in Amazon and learned that it does require a bit of assembling, so we set it up the night before. The kid absolutely loved it!!! We ordered 6 different cars, all very cute. Now that he is older he prefers the version of tower that is more horizontal.
customer_reviews.author: elbasani mom

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Quality toy!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler loves this toy and his mommy secretly does too! It's fun to drive the cars around the track. I like that you can change the track. Standing tall is more fun for my son when he's playing by himself. Making it horizontal is great when we're both playing with it. Storing it vertical helps take up less floor on the room, which is great if your living room is covered in toys, like mine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather L.

customer_reviews.title: Great racetrack, and works with Hot Wheels cars!
customer_reviews.text: Nicely made, sturdy, easy to flip back and forth to the two different positions. I think my toddler will get a lot of good use out of this toy. Also, it does work with Hot Wheels/Matchbox cars, the ride's a little bumpier for them, but they'll go down the track!
customer_reviews.author: Fergie

customer_reviews.title: Fun for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally ordered two of these, but instead of sending one back I brought one to my parents' house so our son could play with it when he visits or stays the night there. We purchased this when our son was about 14 months and he still likes to play with it almost a year later. We bought the set of 4 cars because the two that it came with don't seem like enough to keep a busy kid entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: a nice, big, expensive toy for a low price! :-)
customer_reviews.text: This was our 3 year olds favorite toy he got for Christmas. The size is great, and I love that it folds down easily, and can be used 2 ways. I think it will make the "life" of the toy last longer, because it's more than one way to play with it! :-) Assembly took about 20-30 mins, but there were very detailed and user friendly instructions to put it together. Also "looks" like a nice, big, expensive toy for a low price! :-)
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and so much fun! Our boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit with my grandsons! I just purchased this for our one and three year old grandsons for Christmas and they played with it all day! I purchased a separate pack of Little People cars so they'd have plenty to slide down the ramps and they fit perfectly! I recommend this toy. Very sturdy. Assembly was fairly easy, it has clear colorful step by step instructions, you won't go wrong!
customer_reviews.author: Celia Berru

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for many toys cars
customer_reviews.text: Great toy for many toys cars! We gave this to our son (2 and a half at the time) for Christmas. He is approaching 3, and still plays with this daily. Now he adds in wooden cars, McDonald's toys, Hot Wheels, etc. when playing with this play set. No issues with swapping it from vertical to horizontal orientation. I was surprised nothing has broken off of it yet. Kids can be rough. I've busted our son standing on it, and yet it still prevails.
customer_reviews.author: Rin E.

customer_reviews.title: Sit and Stand Skyway
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this a lot and my grandkids really like playing with it. I was a bit reluctant to buy at first because of a couple of negative reviews concerning assembly. It does have a lot of pieces, BUT--just lay out the pieces and follow the directions. I'm a GRANDmother and it isn't rocket science. I'm happy that I wasn't deterred because of a few reviews from those who get flustered over directions. The boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Key

customer_reviews.title: A toy that breaks the mold and hits 5 star status!
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are easy to follow, well built, can easily change track dimensions without having to take any pieces apart. My 2 year old loves playing with it. The only thing I would improve is when the track is horizontal, the car movement needs to flow better. They get stuck on the edges, and they do not propel easily with just a light push. It could be that one track setup may affect the flow of the other. I applaud the engineers of this amazing track, your are giving joy to kids everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: ... old daughter and 1 year old son both absolutely love this! They use it with their Fisher Price ...
customer_reviews.text: My 3 year old daughter and 1 year old son both absolutely love this! They use it with their Fisher Price Wheelie cars as well as Matchbox/Hotwheels type cars. It was easy to put together as the pieces are numbers and the instructions were very clear. I can see them playing with this for years to come and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Plucky Comic Relief

customer_reviews.title: Cant go wrong with this one
customer_reviews.text: Its made well. A little frustrating to out together but not bad at all. Love that it can be tall or fold down to a horizontal track. Its easy to switch between the two. We take this one out then out it away for a while. Helps keep his interest in it that way.
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth matheson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!Fun to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Best toy ever and a lot of fun putting it together. The box arrived in awful condition, it was a gift, so I had to put it together and luckily no parts were missing, some were beat up, but still functional. Would buy this toy again. Very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly D

customer_reviews.title: Fisher Price Track a Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves her castle, garage or mountain depending on where her imagination takes her. It took me about an hour to follow the detailed instructions to assemble it so make you sure to allow time for that. The track has two positions; when lowered it is more suited for two children playing.
customer_reviews.author: C. Pitzer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat amusing toy, but a real pain to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My son found this toy to be somewhat amusing, but it is a real pain to assemble. Set aside a solid hour to put this thing together. My son lost interest in this toy pretty quickly, but other children may have a different reaction.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Took a bit of work to assemble but it has already paid off in terms of enjoyment. I love that it doesn't need batteries and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old daughter loves this toy. Took a bit of work to assemble but it has already paid off in terms of enjoyment. I love that it doesn't need batteries and that it can be a tower or a horizontal race track. My daughter loves to send the cars down the track and it is easy enough for her to do but interesting and challenging enough to hold her attention.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for a toddler boy.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our son as a first birthday present. He loves it. Even our 2 year old and 9 year old daughters play with it. It coverts easily from a tall tower to a shorter tower. It ended up being a great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Our 16 month old boy loved this for Christmas - he squeals with joy everytime ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 16 month old boy loved this for Christmas - he squeals with joy everytime he puts a car down the ramp when it's in the upright position. However, I will say he gets frustrated when he tries to put any of his larger cars (from other brands, etc) and they get stuck. He also has put various small balls down the ramps, and while they don't stay in the ramp the whole way most of the time, they come shooting out from various locations and he likes it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rintamaki

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves this set.
customer_reviews.text: My child loves sending the cars that come with this as well as other hot wheels down the "Car Wash!" He can't get enough of it, and loves it when we change the setting to the tower. I am very pleased, I just wish I could connect this to other Little people sets to lengthen the fun.
customer_reviews.author: Mario

customer_reviews.title: Huge, but the toddler is obsessed with it.
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old is obsessed with this thing. It's huge so I'm glad we have a playroom it can go in. I would die if that thing had to live in my living room. But it entertains the toddler FOREVER! He also has a bunch of hot wheel cars that work just fine down the ramps.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Held 2 year olds attention for 1 hour!
customer_reviews.text: Put this together for my nephews first birthday and my 2 year old played with it the entire hour it took me! She was so entertained. The 2 levels are very fun. And fun for mom and dad to play with the little ones with it also. I feel like the 2 cars are enough knowing every boy has lots of toy cars and it will be great for them all.
customer_reviews.author: Nick M.

customer_reviews.title: Best toy purchase yet!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic toy to keep a 2-3 year old busy boy occupied! Our toddler loves playing with this in both positions, older bro gets in on the fun because hot wheels easily slide down it as well! Surprised with the quality and ease of assembly for the low price. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ludden

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car changing tracks!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car track. You can use Hotwheels or bigger Fisher Price cars on here so that's great! He loves how he has the option to change the tracks around and make the game a bit different for himself. It's very easy to change the position of the tracks and to move around. I would highly suggest this to anyone that loves tracks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Racquel Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Great fun toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: Such a clever design. Takes a few seconds to transform the play piece from a tall play ramp to a lower one. My 1 and 3 year old play with this. Comes with 2 cars and i like that one of them is a girl so its very gender neutral. We also use other smaller cars and balls to go down the ramps. Bright colors and sturdy design. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie R

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to assemble car racing. My little one likes to make big stunts on this and I'm so happy he's taking a liking to it.
customer_reviews.author: Xena

customer_reviews.title: I was a little dissatisfied with the packaging. It ...
customer_reviews.text: I was a little dissatisfied with the packaging. It came in a plain box. I had to put it together so the little guy knew what it was when he unwrapped it. All the pieces were just thrown in with the directions. All the pieces were there. I was surprised. Other than that my little guy loves it. Durable
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old grandson loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 2 year old grandson and he loves it!! He spends hours playing on it when he comes to visit. It rotates easily from standing position to lowered position. Love it!!! And very pleased with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Storm

customer_reviews.title: The package was badly damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The package was badly damaged when it arrived. I bought the gift for my grandson's 2nd birthday. As I didn't have time to return it and reorder I took a chance and gave it to him. Fortunately all the pieces were still there and the gift was a welcome success.
customer_reviews.author: mumm

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my son for Christmas and it was his favorite toy. He got lots of light up
customer_reviews.text: I waited a while to give my review so that it would be more accurate and helpful. I got this for my son for Christmas and it was his favorite toy. He got lots of light up, musical, noisy toys but this one still is his favorite even after a few months. I personally enjoy it because it doesn't do all that noisy stuff and all four of my kids can play with and enjoy it together. Their ages range from 10yrs-11mos so I feel that this toy will provide many yrs of entertainment. Also it has held up to my kids dragging it around and using it to help balance (my 11 mos old)
customer_reviews.author: ValFam7

customer_reviews.title: One of my sons favorite  birthday gifts!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of two things we got our 2year olds for his birthday and he absolutely loves it! Love that you can transform to a different track in seconds! & This is a huge improvement from the older model, in which I had bought for my older son years back. Great job Fisher Price!
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for hours of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This was the Christmas hit of the year! Lots of fun in both the tower and city settings. The cars that come with it zoom through great. Hot wheels do ok too. Unfortunately any other bigger little people vehicles don’t fit. Still a great hit!
customer_reviews.author: YLH

customer_reviews.title: It’s not to fun to set up and came with 2 ramps that ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 1 year old little boy who loves cars and he loves the track. It’s not to fun to set up and came with 2 ramps that were bent. But after bending those pieces back and finally setting it up, my friends son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Giants13

customer_reviews.title: Possible assembling issue
customer_reviews.text: This product was fairly easy to assemble. If you are not a visual learner though I can see how it would be difficult to assemble, because there are no words telling you exactly how to put it together. The pieces are strong and durable, which is well needed with my boy.
customer_reviews.author: HM09Mom

customer_reviews.title: Son loves
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this a Christmas present. He is 13 months old. My daughter age 3 likes that it can change from tall to horizontal. Although she cannot convert by herself due to buttons on both sides. When tall both kids can still reach top. It came with two cars. We purchased a few more little people cars and they for great.
customer_reviews.author: Cat IR

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy, great price
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to put together, my 2 yr old likes it, it's nice that when he gets tired of playing it one way we switch it up so he can use it the other way for a couple months, I feel like it holds their intrest longer that way
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: we love it. easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: this has provided endless hours of entertainment. we love it. easy to set up. Love that it can be played in 2 ways, the standing way or the long way. My son loves to play both and is constantly switching back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: Instant and lasting fun
customer_reviews.text: Awesome item! Our 21 month old grandson loves it and has spent hours investigating everything about it. Great toy for pretend and building fine motor skills. He gets so excited while eating that he begs to get down quickly so he can play with it again. It's his favorite amoung all of his many toys.
customer_reviews.author: Anita morgan

customer_reviews.title: My toddlers love it
customer_reviews.text: Got this set for my 2 yr old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it. So does his 4 yr old sister. It's about as tall as he is when set up I the upright position. He can endlessly send his little cars down the slide and watch them come out at the bottom. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Lera B

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2.5 yr old son loves this toy. Is easy to transition from sitting toy to standing toy. It's a bit challenging to put together as the instructions are a little hard to follow and the screws are a little hard to get in. Using a drill or electric screwdriver is very helpful. I would purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Escobedo

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Really entertaining.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this! It took while to put together but it was so worth the hour. It's the most played with toy in the house which is saying something cause my kids hardly ever play on their own and they use this all day!
customer_reviews.author: Peter Hall

customer_reviews.title: 19 month old loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this toy, I think it was his favorite Christmas present. It's a lot of pieces to put together, but it's easy to fold from standing up to laying down. The only issue is one of the cars is a little bigger than the other and flips when going down the loops, but my son doesn't mind it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun!
customer_reviews.text: My almost 2 year old nephew loves his new toy! I love how he can either stand or sit to play with it. It did take some time to assemble (30 min) but it was well worth it to see the smile on his face while playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: ... Christmas for the boys and it has been a good investment. The kids love playing with the ramp
customer_reviews.text: We got this for $25 before Christmas for the boys and it has been a good investment. The kids love playing with the ramp. Kids can also use other small cars apart from the two provided.
customer_reviews.author: Indranil Biswas

customer_reviews.title: Fun...
customer_reviews.text: I love this toy for my son. I like that it converts from a standing to sitting, although we mostly use it standing because IT'S SO COOL WHEN THE CARS GO FAST! We also use it with balls. We really do enjoy playing with this toy, I would definitely make this purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Brown

customer_reviews.title: This is really a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is really a waste of money. My son did not play with it more than 2 minutes. Even those 2 minutes were not the good ones. Not much is going on.. There are not varying paths. The two set up is a joke as well. Nope, do not buy it. There are a lot better designs.
customer_reviews.author: roja ergun

customer_reviews.title: Our son has loved it now for months and I think will get ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a toy that will last for a long time. Our son has loved it now for months and I think will get even more use as he gets older. No regrets on purchasing this!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: 2year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to piece together, easy to swap positions, fits hot wheels and Disney cars vehicles. Good width & height.
customer_reviews.author: @Ladythelovelycocker

customer_reviews.title: Good work, Santa!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my 17 month old. He received for Christmas and has been playing with it everyday. He asks for his cars when he wakes up in the morning. It arrived in a plain brown box (no pictures) so not ideal for gifting. If you don't mind that, it's great!
customer_reviews.author: annie

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for the right price.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters love playing with this. I just wish that the pieces fit together when you convert it from sit to stand. Still functional but doesn't properly kick in.
customer_reviews.author: killaton

customer_reviews.title: Amazing and super entertaining for all ages. Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My toddler is fascinated with this toy and plays alone with i ck atantly. Easy to change positions and 3 kids can play at a time and have a great time. I recomend for bots abd girls.
customer_reviews.author: giannina b.

customer_reviews.title: great for many ages
customer_reviews.text: my 2 yr old and my 4 yr both love playing with this! It was a big hit in our house. we bought it as a gift for our 2 year old, but our 4 year old likes it just as much! and it's so fun watching them play together with it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily J.

customer_reviews.title: Great entertainment for out 18 month old
customer_reviews.text: Great entertainment for out 18 month old. I didnt realize it converts into two different configurations: tall, for standup play and low for sit down play, in a matter of seconds, it was a great surprise. Had the buy a few more cars since we already lost a couple.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good for 2 year old
customer_reviews.text: My two year old loves playing with this. Sometimes he likes to make it stand and then slide his car. Or then make it in a horizontal position and try circling his car around it. This helps my son to engage in it for some time.
customer_reviews.author: Sohit

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and extra cars for my one year old grandson for Christmas. He absolutely loves it. It is the perfect height for a little boy to race his cars one after another. His parents appreciated the easy to open packaging. Great Fisher Price quality - as usual ;-)
customer_reviews.author: mamashu

customer_reviews.title: If they like cars and trucks, they will love this.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my granddaughter's 2nd birthday. Took a bit to get it put together. She loved it! The tall version is great for the delight of the cars racing down. The sitting version is perfect for pretend and pushing the cars around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and a great toy for my 22month old boy
customer_reviews.text: The ultimate toy for a 22 month old boy ( and my 6 yo daughter loves it, too!) Affordable and easy to assemble even though it takes about 40minutes to put together. Fantastic gift!
customer_reviews.author: Delaware

customer_reviews.title: A year later and my kids still love it, I have a one year old and ...
customer_reviews.text: A year later and my kids still love it, I have a one year old and a four year soon to be five and he loves to put any type of car.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Hours of imagination and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this (and 8 extra cars with littles) for almost 3-year-old grandson. It's the only toy he wants in his room!
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. We just purchased as a Christmas present. All three kids have been playing with it. I love that it can easily played two different ways. It can stand tall or fold down flatter. I'm sure they'll be enjoying this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: SMB

customer_reviews.title: He also loves the changeable configuration to add another level of fun. It was worth every penny although it took ...
customer_reviews.text: Our 15 month grandson loves it. Although he cannot totally reach the top he places the cars on the ramp he is able to reach. He has learned to put gas in the cars with the little pump and he is able to lift the gate to watch cars roll down. He also loves the changeable configuration to add another level of fun. It was worth every penny although it took about half hour to put together.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Great for car loving kids
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy for kids who love cars. My son would play with this all day if it was up to him. He uses the Tonka Chuck cars and match box cars with it. They don't work as well as the little people cars, but they do work.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. My son can convert it easily. Love that the pieces are screwed together so parts aren't getting knocked off (like another similar product we own).
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn R. McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Can't stop playing with this toy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kids under five ...they play with it a lot so its a good buy. Well made and eassy to assemble but read directions first to make it easy. Kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Z2K

customer_reviews.title: A really great product! We bought it for Christmas and it ...
customer_reviews.text: A really great product! We bought it for Christmas and it has provided endless hours of fun for all of my kids. It's sturdy and thought it does require assembly, once put together it is very stable. The only caveat would be that it doesn't work great with hot wheels cars, as the tracks are too wide and there are holes down the middle that catch the little wheels. But my kids don't care and it's a great toy!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fun
customer_reviews.text: My 1-year-old granddaughter had immediate fun with this toy and should continue to have fun with it as she grows. We pre-assembled it before giving it to her, and it took about 40 minutes and 2 adults to figure it out, but it did go together nicely. I bought a second one for my 2-year old grandson for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Kit in Kansas

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: My almost 3 year old grandson loves this toy. He has so much fun with it. We assembled it before giving it to him, which was a good tip from other reviewers. It is nicely made and I am pleased that I bought it for him!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent (But take your time building it)
customer_reviews.text: Ok - so this toy is a HIT. All my kids friends still love playing with this thing and it has been months now so that is amazing. BUT, be prepared --- it takes like an hour - 2 hrs to assemble - and follow the directions CAREFULLY.
customer_reviews.author: Armando Segura

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for his gift
customer_reviews.text: Our great-grandson was thrilled with this toy. He was able to start playing with it right away as my husband spent an hour putting it together before Christmas. He clapped every time the cars went down the track. Great choice for his gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for around age 2 1\2
customer_reviews.text: The only complaint I have is it did not come in its original box. Just an Amazon box. Other than that perfectly described, great for around age 2 1\2, 3.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Dronet

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Fund
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my 2 year old granddaughter and she absolutely loves playing with it. We turned it down to a sit and play toy and she loves pushing the cars around the track and making them go down the three different ramps.
customer_reviews.author: goldwigg4

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: My kid had more fun trying to climb inside it, which is impossible. But he's not the brightest. Not even sure if he is mine to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: My kids (4 and 2) love this! They play with it for hours at ...
customer_reviews.text: My kids (4 and 2) love this! They play with it for hours at a time. This is also the first toy I have been able to assemble without husband. Higly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly and Mark

customer_reviews.title: 2 yr old loved this. still plays with it a lot
customer_reviews.text: 2 yr old loved this. still plays with it a lot. it will break down so a child can lay on the floor and play with it also. works good not junky and fragile.
customer_reviews.author: KITTY WATERS

customer_reviews.title: Preschooler loves this toy!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old son loves this. We bought it for Christmas and he plays with it often every day. Was easy to assemble, and easy to convert from sit to stand (adult or older child needs to do this, though). Would definitely recommend for any child who loves cars!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: the design is excellent and provides two toys in one
customer_reviews.text: My daughter refers to this marvelous toy which we gave our grandson for his 2nd birthday "The TOY". He plays with it every day. It took about an hour to assemble; the design is excellent and provides two toys in one. It only comes with two cars. We bought a set of four additional ones which I highly recommend so that friends can play too.
customer_reviews.author: Ani Bean

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandson
customer_reviews.text: My grandson likes this product he can stand up sit on the ground because it is it adjustable
customer_reviews.author: fin

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Little People Sit 'n Stand Skyway [Amazon Exclusive]
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingWith the Little People Sit 'n Stand Skyway playset, kids are in the driver's seat of 2-in-1 zip & zoom fun! They can start out zipping their Wheeliesvehicles over the roads and down the ramps of the horizontal town, stopping to fill up at the gas pump at the bottom. Then take it up … up … up … to a vertical Skyway that stands over 34" tall. Now toddlers can place their Wheelies vehicles at the top and watch as the cars zip & zoom their way around & around (& around) the spiral ramps all the way to the bottom! Kids steer their own adventures as this skyway playset changes from a sit-at roadway to a stand-up Skyway (and back again!) with the help of mom or dad.
feature_bullets: Press down on Santa to hear a fun tune and sounds!
Kids enjoy zip-zoomin' fun in more ways than one! Converts from sit-at-roadway to stand-up Skyway (and back again!)

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
